title: The Problem with Traditional Customer Support
text: Customers expect instant replies, but human support is limited. Hiring & training agents is expensive, and every unanswered query becomes a lost sale. Our AI-powered chatbots provide instant, intelligent, and automated responses—24/7—helping businesses increase efficiency, reduce costs, and improve customer satisfaction.
